results.title: Glyburide/metformin tablets: a new therapeutic option for the management of Type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: A new single-tablet of @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glyburide@@@/@CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combination therapy (@<m>CHEMICAL_Glucovance</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C417231 @@@Glucovance@@@), Bristol-Myers Squibb, Inc.) has recently been developed, which addresses the primary defects of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 diabetes@@@: @DISEASE_Insulinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D007340 @@@beta-cell dysfunction@@@ and @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@.
